posts.descricao_interna: Terra is an internet multinational company. On the web portal they offer several online courses and I was in charge of developing some of their landing pages, such as English courses, Sewing courses, Website building courses and others. The site is built with Gulp processor and Sass and there are smooth JS parallax effects, developed with a heavy emphasis on mobile and tablet functionality to ensure a fluid experience cross-platform.

Terra is an internet multinational company. On the web portal they offer several online courses and I was in charge of developing some of their landing pages, such as English courses, Sewing courses, Website building courses and others. The site is built with Gulp processor and Sass and there are smooth JS parallax effects, developed with a heavy emphasis on mobile and tablet functionality to ensure a fluid experience cross-platform.

Banpar is a credit consultant company and I was in charge of developing their institutional website. I worked along with the UX/UI team who created the clean and modern design. The website was built on Sass for the style, Bootstrap as framework, mainly for the grid, which is a strong characteristic of the layout, and AngularJS was used as the JS framework, which was helpful with the development of all the website forms. It was entirely built with cross-browser and responsive compatibility to ensure the website works across a wide range of devices from mobile to desktop.

Trusthub is a finantial consultant company. Along with the intitutional website, there was the user personal account, and a whole finantial simulation page. Built in AngularJS and Sass, it was developed to have a great performance on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices. Makes use of Angular-material for front-end visuals. Features details as gradient elements, delicated animations and some components such as convinient sliders.

Kit Kat - Break da Sorte was a promotional website where KitKat costumers could win an Android tablet. Needing to work across all browsers and devices, it was built using Bootstrap. Since it was a promotional site, it required customized forms, login page, registered users page for admins etc.

Nescau Aventuras Walt Disney World was a promotional website where the registered user could win a trip to Walt Disney World. I was in charge to develop the front-end part of the project, using the Bootstrap framework. The site was built on a responsive structure so users could register to participate the promotion on their phone, tablet and desktop.

descricao.titulo: I love to create intuitive, easy to use and beautiful responsive interfaces with code.
descricao.texto: Hi, my name is Livia. I'm currently living in Sao Paulo and I've been working as a web designer for 6+ years and I have specialized and focused on front-end development. I have experience on working in agency and worked with some big clients such as Nestlé, Terra, Next & Bradesco. Oh I also love to travel and I'm a cat lady!

detalhes.titulo: I value delivering an intuitive, easy to use and functional product.
detalhes.texto: With a solid understanding of UX/UI Design and SEO principles, I am a detail-oriented professional committed to meeting project deadlines. I have experience collaborating with teams of Designers, Front-end and Back-end Developers on various projects, where I have developed high-quality, clean code while adhering to best practices and standards for web and mobile. I am passionate about learning and exploring new digital technologies, and I am always eager to share my knowledge with others. I have the ability to translate customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications, ensuring cross-platform compatibility, performance, and support for older browsers.
